title: 关于scoreboard指令的问题
author: GTVZDH123
txt_content:
请问一下要怎么把这个NBT加到指令里面去1 54 {AttributeModifiers:[],display:{Name:"spawn",Lore:["Q键丢在地上使用"],color:}}复制代码指令：
/scoreboard players set @e[type=Item] summon 5 {Item:{id:"minecraft:spawn_egg"}}复制代码

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content: /scoreboard players set @e[type=Item] summon 5 {Item:{id:"minecraft:spawn_egg",tag:{AttributeModifiers:[],display:{Name:"spawn",Lore:["Q键丢在地上使用"],color:}}}}
